EmailTemplate.subject: RE: M&T wants Sandra McDonald from 10/22/2012 thru at least 4/26/2013 ***correction (1349703901.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Sandra, Per the introduction from John I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1havkJ3%2BOiVI6LovyzBcpen9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1havkJ3%2BOiVI6LovyzBcpen9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Nicolette From: John Berry [mailto:berry@hireme2.com] Sent: Saturday, October 06, 2012 7:41 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Cc: sandra9168@aol.com Subject: RE: M&T wants Sandra McDonald from 10/22/2012 thru at least 4/26/2013 ***correction From: John Berry [mailto:berry@hireme2.com] <mailto:[mailto:berry@hireme2.com]> Sent: Friday, October 05, 2012 4:26 PM To: Nicolette Taylor; sandra9168@aol.com <mailto:sandra9168@aol.com> Subject: M&T wants Sandra McDonald from 10/22/2012 thru at least 4/26/2013 M&T wants Sandra McDonald from 10/22/2012 thru at least 4/26/2013 Nicolette: Sandra McDonald wants to consider using MBO’s services.M&T has made her an offer and she’s been there before but now a W2 requirement is in place by M&T Bank.I’m giving her your contact information via this email and she might be contacting you in the near future. Sandra: Below is contact information for Nicolette at MBO partners.___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Corporate statement: -That the activities that I engage in my work with other people, inspires them and enriches their lives. -That I am an opening thru which energy flows from the Source of all life, for the benefit of all. John BerryJohn Berry Personnel Consultants 800-HIRE-ME2berry@hireme2.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:berry@hireme2.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1havkJ3%2BOiVI6LovyzBcpen9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> See our job posting site at www.abesap.com/pages/nonsap.cfm <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.abesap.com/pages/nonsap.cfm?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1havkJ3%2BOiVI6LovyzBcpen9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.linkedin.com/in/hireme2?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1havkJ3%2BOiVI6LovyzBcpen9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>
